data.md:MetaData: Physical oceanography during POLARSTERN cruise ARK-VIII/2

Scientific Cruise Report of the 1991 Arctic Expedition ARK-VIII/2 of RV Polarstern (EPOS II: Study of the European Arctic Shelf, SEAS, of the European Science Foundation) (Wissenschaftlicher Fahrtbericht über die Arktis-Expedition ARK VIII/2 von 1991 mit FS Polarstern)
